nodes.text: Thug was a Gamorrean guard who defended the interior of Jabba's Palace. One of nine, he was often partnered with Thok.

Bounty Hunters features 'Gamorrean Thug'.
It is unclear whether this figure is meant to represent the Gamorrean named Thug, or simply a generic thug who is a Gamorrean.
The figure is depicted holding a blaster rifle, and though contrary to his appearance on screen, this may represent an appearance outside of it.
Gamorrean Thug's card Bio reads "When you need muscle for a job, a Gamorrean makes a good choice."
